sourcesContent:
import Card from '../../UI/card/Card'; import './InfoBoard.css'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faUser, faCartShopping, faCircleDollarToSlot, faWallet } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { useAPI } from '../../store/APIContext'; const InfoBoard = () => { const { users, transactions } = useAPI(); // console.log(transactions); return
users

{users.length}
orders

{transactions.length}
earnings

$ {transactions.map(i => i.price).reduce((cur, mov) => cur + mov, 0)}
balance

$ 100
} export default InfoBoard;
